description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 3/10/2006

Brooke is shocked to find Nick and Taylor in a compromising position. Brooke is angry and upset.  After Taylor leaves Nick begs Brooke to understand that it’s all a big misunderstanding. Stephanie visits with Dominick and finds happiness that Felicia’s spirit lives in the little boy. Dante tells Stephanie, Dominick will have a good life. Jackie tells Ridge that Brooke ran off to find Nick and Ridge is furious.
